1.0.2.name: wordpress/idx-broker-platinum
1.0.2.description:
IDX Broker Platinum Plugin


  • Fully indexable custom domain feature. Subdomains are just as indexable as subfolders on your website, Just ask Google.
  • NEW in 1.0.7 - Use short codes to add IDX Page Links and Widgets to your WordPress Posts and Pages!
  • NEW - Search-friendly property URLs. Display property address and much more in your IDX URL and get those pages indexed by search enginers faster.
  • NEW - Mobile-friendly IDX search. The most powerful mobile IDX solution that money can buy, at no extra cost. Mobile features include lead capture, property saves, tap to call or email, and full CSS customization!
  • NEW - Team and Office accounts may now assign a custom link to ANY agent. Give
